qas.question: What two theatres are located close to Hollywood?
What is a major dance venue popular in Hollywood?
What cinema  is included at the Graffiti Theatre Company?

context: The Cork School of Music and the Crawford College of Art and Design provide <b11_0>a throughput of new blood<b11_0/>, as do the active theatre components of several courses at University College Cork (UCC). Highlights include: Corcadorca Theatre Company, of which <a1_0><b5_0><b7_0>Cillian Murphy<b7_0/><b5_0/><a1_0/> was a troupe member prior to Hollywood fame; <b6_0>the Institute for Choreography and Dance<b6_0/>, a national contemporary dance resource;[citation needed] the Triskel Arts Centre (capacity c.90), which includes the <b10_0>Triskel Christchurch independent cinema<b10_0/>; dance venue <a2_0><b9_0>the Firkin Crane<b9_0/> (capacity c.240)<a2_0/>; the <a3_0>Cork Academy of Dramatic Art (CADA) and Graffiti Theatre Company<a3_0/>; and <a4_0>the Cork Jazz Festival, Cork Film Festival, and Live at the Marquee<a4_0/> events. <a0_0><b8_0>The Everyman Palace Theatre (capacity c.650) and the Granary Theatre (capacity c.150)<b8_0/><a0_0/> both play host to dramatic plays throughout the year.
